column3: Sector Profile - Fiscal Year 2011 (Oct. 1st through Sept. 30th)

column2: * Southwest Border Sectors staffing statistics include:  Big Bend, Del Rio, El Centro, El Paso, Laredo, Rio Grande Valley, San Diego, Tucson, Yuma and the Special Operations Group.
** Nationwide staffing statistics include:   All Sectors and U.S. Border Patrol Headquarters.
*** Rescue and Death statistics are not tracked for Northern and Coastal Border Sectors.
